Title: Bus passengers by population
Description: Bus passenger trips by head of population by local authority (England)

Title: BODS location data
Description: This catalogue contains the live locations of buses within Bus Open Data Service

Title: BODS fare data
Description: This catalogue contains fares data for operators within Bus Open Data Service.

Title: BODS timetable data
Description: This contains a detailed granular view of the timetable data within Bus Open Data Service.

Title: National Public Transport Access Nodes (NaPTAN)
Description: The data set contains the location of public transport access points. This includes bus stops, ferry terminals, airports, rail stations, coaches, trams, underground and metro stations.

Title: Rail Passenger usage (entries and exits)
Description: Rail passenger numbers by rail station (including interchange)

Title: Primary Schools
Description: Primary schools by school census data

Title: Secondary Schools
Description: Secondary schools by school census data

Title: Bristol car club bays
Description: Car bay locations for various car clubs operating in the West of England, such as Zipcar and Co-wheels

Title: Bristol Cycle Network Map
Description: A database of existing and proposed cycle routes in Bristol, used by BCC for maintaining and planning the cycle network. It includes the strategic cycle network, location of cycling infrastructure, vehicle and cycle flows, and proposed schemes.

Title: Bristol Car Park locations
Description: Locations of car parks in Bristol, including Park and Ride car parks. Attributes include car park type, number of spaces, operating times

Title: Electric Vehicle Charging Points
Description: Location and details of electric vehicles charging points in Bristol

Title: Bristol traffic accidents
Description: Bristol road accidents involving personal injury that were reported to police and passed on to the City Council. Damage only accidents are not recorded

Title: Bristol Traffic Counters
Description: Locations and meta data for traffic counters. These are induction loops in the road that detect the passing vehicles but don't discriminate between vehicle types.

Title: Bristol traffic count data
Description: Hourly traffic flow data from re - purposed SCOOT traffic counters. These are induction loop counters embedded in roads that detect when a vehicle passes that point. They do not discriminate between vehicle types.

Title: AADT / AADF count data
Description: Summary and street-level traffic data for road-links on the motorway, 'A' road and minor road network in Great Britain.

Title: Road traffic statistics
Description: Bulk download traffic figures for all regions, all local authorities and all count point locations.

Title: WebTRIS
Description: National Highways MIDAS site flow reports accessible through web portal or API

Title: Geology (625k resolution)
Description: Geoglogical survey data of local geology

Title: National Charge Point Registry
Description: A real-time view of Publicly Accessible PiV (plugged-in vehicle) Charge Points within the UK.

Title: Flood Risk areas
Description: Flood risk mapping by flood risk zone

Title: UK local authority and regional greenhouse gas emissions
Description: A breakdown of greenhouse gas emissions by Local Authority area
Source: Department for Energy Security and Net Zero

Title: STATS19
Description: Recorded road traffic accident statistics

Title: National Travel Survey
Description: Statistics and data about the National Travel Survey, based on a household survey to monitor trends in personal travel.

Title: Road freight: domestic and international statistics
Description: Data and statistics about domestic and international road freight activity

Title: Trip End Model Presentation Program (TEMPro)
Description: The TEMPro software, including guidance documents, used for viewing the National Trip End Model (NTEM) information.

Title: Local bus passenger journeys (BUS01)
Description: Total bus passengers by local authority (England)

Title: Journey Time Statistics (JTS)
Description: Journey time statistics to destinations - national dataset by local authority

Title: Road condition statistics (DfT)
Description: Data about the condition and maintenance of roads by local authority and Highways England, produced by Department of Transport.

Title: Road length statistics (RDL)
Description: Data on road length by region, country, road type and local authority

Title: English indices of deprivation 2019
Description: Index of multiple deprivation, including subset data and IMD segmentation
Source: Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government

Title: Daily domestic transport use by mode
Description: Daily usage of selected domestic transport by mode for Great Britain

Title: General Practitioner's (GPs) surgeries
Description: Registered General Practitioner locations

Title: Hospital Locations
Description: Location of hospitals with a Accident and Emergency department

Title: Economic Activity (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of economic activity by household

Title: Car ownership by Household (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of car ownership by household

Title: Location of usual residence and place of work by method of travel to work (2011 Census)
Description: 2011 census data of travel to work (TTW) areas origins and destinations

Title: Business Register and Employment Survey data
Description: Business Register and Employment Survey data - Annual employee and employment estimates for Great Britain and UK split by region. Results given by full-time/part-time and public/private splits.

Title: OS AddressBase
Description: AddressBase matches 29 million Royal Mail postal address to unique property reference numbers (UPRN), bringing a geographical dimension to the matched records. This is a paid for dataset but is avaible for public sector use under PSGA

Title: OS AddressBasePlus
Description: Along with Royal Mail PAF data, AddressBase® Plus gives you up-to-date local authority addresses, multi-occupancy addresses and OS MasterMap TOID references. This is a paid for dataset but is avaible for public sector use under PSGA

Title: OS AddressBasePremium
Description: AddressBase Premium has over 40 million addresses and 100 million cross references as well as providing all the information relating to an address from creation to retirement. This is a paid for dataset but is avaible for public sector use under PSGA

Title: OS Boundary Line
Description: Collection of boundary datasets, including local authority boundaries and geodemographic boundaries

Title: OS Codepoint
Description: Postcode point data

Title: OS Codepoint Poly
Description: Postcode polygon data

Title: OS MasterMap Highways Network - Roads
Description: Road and path network dataset for Great Britain. It records the dimensions and accessibility of roads.

Title: OS MasterMap Highways Network - Paths
Description: GIS Line network of urbans paths, with classifications

Title: OS Open Roads
Description: GIS Line network of roads, with classifications (open data source)
File format: Vector Tiles; GeoPackage; GML 3.2; Esri Shape file

Title: OS Terrain 5
Description: Digital Terrain Model (DTM) of Great Britain. It is available as a grid of heighted points and contours, both at five-metre intervals.

Title: OS Terrain 50
Description: OS Terrain® 50 is an open height dataset of contours with spot heights, breaklines, coastline, lakes, ridges and formlines for Great Britain.

Title: Sports England Active Lives Survey
Description: Data of walking and cycling activity within the population for recreation

Title: Traveline National Dataset (TNDS)
Description: TNDS contains public transport timetables for bus, light rail, tram and ferry services in Great Britain

Title: Traveline Public Transport Timetable Data
Description: Dataset of public transport timetable data (more recent data available)

Title: Reclassified Routes Public
Description: Reclassified routes, formerly National Cycle Network, are considered suitable for people who are confident and experienced at cycling.

Title: Removed Cycle Routes
Description: This a dataset of routes removed from the National Cycle Network. Removed routes which do not meet the Sustrans vision of a network of paths for everyone.

Title: Built Up Areas (2011)
Description: This file contains the digital vector boundaries for built-up areas in England and Wales as at 27 March 2011 (Census day). The built-up area boundaries are generalised and created using an automated approach based on a 50m grid squares.
File format: CSV; Shapefile; SQLite Geodatabase; GeoPackage; GeoJSON; Excel

Title: Asset register and land ownership polygons
Description: Land and Property owned by Bristol City Council

Title: Bristol leisure cycle rides routes
Description: Dataset showing routes of leisure rides for bicycles in and around Bristol

Title: Rider Zones 27700
Description: Rider Zones map showing boundaries for the use of Rider tickets in the West of England.

Title: Car Availability Household 2011 Oa Poly
Description: Car and van availability in households by Output Areas

Title: Connected Nations
Description: Datasets underpinning the Ofcom connected Nations report. This is based on mobile coverage and fixed broadband availability across the UK as of January 2022.

Title: OS MasterMap Greenspace
Description: The OS MasterMap Greenspace Layer dataset has been designed for the public sector, it shows accessible and non-accessible greenspaces in urban areas, helping to support a wider set of government initiatives around health and the environment. This is a paid for dataset but is avaible for public sector use under PSGA
File format: ESRI Shapefile; GML; GeoPackage; Vector Tiles

Title: OS MasterMap Topography
Description: The OS MasterMap Topography layer is presented seamlessly with more than 500 Million real world objects – all uniquely identified - including roads, buildings, parks and waterways all managed and maintained by Ordnance Survey within one of the world’s largest spatial databases.? This is a paid for dataset but is avaible for public sector use under PSGA

Title: OS Open Greenspace
Description: The location of public parks, playing fields, sports facilities, play areas, allotments and more with OS Open Greenspace.
File format: ESRI Shapefile; GML; GeoPackage; Vector Tiles

Title: OS Open Rivers
Description: A dataset showing the high-level view of watercourses in Great Britain. OS Open Rivers GIS data contains over 144,000 km of water bodies and watercourses map data. These include freshwater rivers, tidal estuaries and canals.
File format: ESRI Shapefile; GML; GeoPackage; Vector Tiles

Title: OS Open UPRN
Description: UPRNs (Unique Property Reference Number) are the authoritative identifier used to uniquely identify addressable locations in Great Britain. Essential for bringing property and address information together.

Title: Public rights of way (Bath & North East Somerset Council)
Description: Dataset containing the public rights of way of Bath and North East Somerset.  The details of the public rights of way network contained in an authority's data are for information only, and are an interpretation of the Definitive Map, not the Definitive Map itself, and should not be relied on for determining the position or alignment of any public right of way

Title: Public rights of way (BCC)
Description: Dataset containing the public rights of way of Bristol City Council.  The details of the public rights of way network contained in an authority's data are for information only, and are an interpretation of the Definitive Map, not the Definitive Map itself, and should not be relied on for determining the position or alignment of any public right of way

Title: Public rights of way (NSC)
Description: Dataset containing the public rights of way of North Somerset.  The details of the public rights of way network contained in an authority's data are for information only, and are an interpretation of the Definitive Map, not the Definitive Map itself, and should not be relied on for determining the position or alignment of any public right of way

Title: Public rights of way (SGLOS)
Description: Dataset containing the public rights of way of South Gloucestershire.  The details of the public rights of way network contained in an authority's data are for information only, and are an interpretation of the Definitive Map, not the Definitive Map itself, and should not be relied on for determining the position or alignment of any public right of way
